Text: Erb FamilyQ Ive confirmed that all four of us are covered under the TSF health plan as of Furthermore inoculations are covered so you should only pay the copay Love Kim

Practice Friday SaturdayHello Pelicans Just a quick reminder of our scheduled practice Friday at and Saturday at noon As this is our first emailing please confirm receipt of this message See everybody Friday Kim R Erb Supervisor Marketing Services
MoneyI will get Kim R Erb Supervisor Marketing Services
Happy Valentines Cc Q I love you always Kim

Happy Valentines Day Cc Q I know this is early but I wanted to tell you today so that you can go home tonight and retrieve something that I left for you and the kids Open my top drawer in my dresser in the closet and youll find your little surprise Hopefully my little token will make up for me not being there on Valentines Day I love you and Im always thinking of my three Valentines Love Kim

Q I think Im going to sweat to death Its rainy here and sooooo muggy Ive done everything wrong in my battle to control jet lag I took a short nap yesterday about pm I didnt wake up until that night Needless to say I did not sleep well last night As a result Ill struggle to keep my head from crashing thru my computer monitor this afternoon I have not had a chance to look around Jakarta yet but it is a huge city Our office here is on the th top floor and has a commanding view of the city Jakarta has quite a few tall buildings but they are spread out around the city Quite a contrast to Houstons skyline Is your Sister coming next weekend I hope so as it will be nice for you to see your sister Time to get back to work I want you to know that I miss you and I promise to hurry home Love Kim
Sundeck and California Closets are both scheduled for Monday afternoon on February th

Chad Erb Cc Q What are your plans for Chad next Saturday during the Shower Are you taking him to play with Tom or do you want Grandpa to watch him Grandpa wants to make plans to either play with Chad or to go into work It does not matter to him either way but he would like to know Love Kim

FYIPelicans Myrtle Beach Pelicans Atlanta Braves Class A Farm Team In case you want to impress your husbands andor children Shelley you couldnt impress me anymore than you already do Shelley predicted Sarah Hughes would win the Gold Medal earlier this week Kim Erb

SPRC MeetingShelley What do you think Beez Since our telephone conversation concerning the special SPRC meeting I have prayedthought about the topic and have the following opinion While I agree that this decision has to be made with the good of the entire congregation in mind I would like to say that my family and I feel our personal needs are being met by Ernie and the example he provides We have witnessed Ernie handle delicate situations with compassion and consideration We also appreciate Ernies support during Alinas difficult transition at ACEC We feel that while Ernies sermons may be hard to follow at times and that he is not the most outgoing person we never have questioned his sincerity or dedication for this church Having said this we realize that we dont have the day to day contact with Ernie that seems to be a component of the problem Furthermore I dont believe we can afford to have AUMCs membership adversely affected if this church is to be the kind of church we hope it will be Therefore I guess my official position is that Ernie has my familys support but AUMC is our home and whatever is best for AUMC that is the direction we should take Kim
Happy BirthdayMom Happy Birthday Was I the first Cant what to see you this weekend Think about where you want to go to dinner Love Your Favorite SonNot Ryan Kim

Aeros TicketsAnita Marc I have investigated the procedure for picking up Aeros tickets at the Will Call window thinking it would be conveniently located at the Campaq Center Much to my surprise the Aeros Will Call window is located in their office at Wilcrest and Richmond They have four tickets for the Erbs and three tickets for the Kudlas I drive right by their location on my way home and I plan to pick up my tickets on Thursday evening Would you like me to pick up your tickets also If so do you want all three I remember Marc saying that Anita was not sure if she would be attending I still dont know if Shelley and Alina are going either but I think they may Also I was going to offer the four Enron tickets to Terrell Hemphill and family Game time Friday is We may be a little late but that is no big deal to me Kim R Erb Supervisor Marketing Services
SundeckQ What days are you available for Sundeck to come out Kim
Dinner for tonightQ I will be ordering pizza tonight so please dont make other arrangements What time is Alinas doctor appointment tomorrow Kim R Erb Supervisor Marketing Services

FW Aeros Game Friday Night Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday February AM To Erb Kim Subject Re Aeros Game Friday Night you bet that sounds great we are in bigtime thanks Kim Erb Kim To Gina Hemphill Email watercom ghemphillMSNcom Terrell Hemphill Email PM cc Subject Aeros Game Friday Night Terrell Gina As you may or may not be aware The Dicks Kudlas and Erbs are all going to the Aeros game Friday night after practice The kids were given Aeros tickets for good grades We also stumbled upon four additional tickets thru work and were wondering if you and your family would like to use them I have no idea where all the seats are located but Im sure we could probably all relocate around each other Let me know if you would like to use the tickets If not we can return them and somebody else can use them Kim R Erb Supervisor Marketing Services
Sleeping BagQ What does it look like for you Can you leave early enough today to pick up a sleeping bag If not I need to know as I would like to pick it up at lunch Love Kim

FWPennsylvania Queenie General information from somebody here that recently adopted a child FYI The Kazak Princess had me pick her up after you left and immediately calmed down She was jibber jabbering at me and I assume she was asking me not to go to work Later when I tried to leave all hell broke loose Im not looking forward to sending her back for many reasons Love Kimmer Original Message From Gallegos Anthony Sent Thursday July AM To Erb Kim Subject Sorry for the delay in forwarding statutesfatochtml statutesfafatochtml statutesfafatochtml Good luck Anthony Gallegos Corporate Planning Tele email
